content: lion brand pattern # 60508 published in knit it knit 1 learn to crochet digest learn to knit digest simply creative crochet woman s day skill level beginner microspun article #910 1 ball *shown in sterling * crochet hook - size s-35 speed hook 19 mm *due to the nature of the fabric when working with speed hook gauge may vary throughout and is not crucial to this project * worked from the long edge in 1-row pattern repeat see lacy scarf #60511 1 for the super bulky weight yarn version in bolero 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/lacy-scarf-60511
